Uses of Interface
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.headless.HeadlessMediaPlayer

  • Packages that use HeadlessMediaPlayer 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
    This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.headless
    Provides the classes necessary to support the use of native media players that do not render video output locally - for example streaming servers.

    • Uses of HeadlessMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

      Methods in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player that return HeadlessMediaPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HeadlessMediaPlayer MediaPlayerFactory.newHeadlessMediaPlayer()
      Create a new headless media player.

    • Uses of HeadlessMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.headless

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.headless that implement HeadlessMediaPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultHeadlessMediaPlayer
      A media player implementation with no user interface component to render the video to.
